original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena rāhulaḥ kumāra śayanatalagato 'nyatarānyatarāyā rākṣasyā
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena rāhulaḥ kumāra śayana tala gataḥ nyatara anyatarāyāḥ rākṣasyā

original: utrāsito 'bhūt* atha rāhulaḥ kumāras tasya rātryā atyayena bahulaiḥ kumārakaiḥ parivṛtaḥ

original: puraskṛtaḥ kapilavastuto 'bhiniṣkramya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
analyzed: puraskṛtaḥ kapilavastutaḥ bhiniṣkramya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāmat upasaṃkramya

original: bhagavataḥ pādayo śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthita rodati /
analyzed: bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ puratas sthita rodati

original: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda rāhulasya kumārasya pratisaṃrakṣaṇīyāṃ mekhalā nāma vidyā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ śṛṇvantu me devagaṇā nāgagaṇā rākṣasagaṇā (MDh_115r1)
analyzed: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda rāhulasya kumārasya pratisaṃrakṣaṇīyām mekhalā nāma vidyā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ śṛṇvantu me deva gaṇāḥ nāga gaṇāḥ rākṣasa gaṇāḥ

original: asuragaṇā garuḍagaṇā gandharvagaṇā kinnaragaṇā piśācagaṇā kuṃbhāṇḍagaṇā pūtanagaṇā grahagaṇā nakṣatragaṇā aṣṭāviṃsati mahāyakṣasenāpati /
analyzed: asura gaṇāḥ garuḍa gaṇāḥ gandharva gaṇā kinnara gaṇāḥ piśāca gaṇā kuṃbhāṇḍa gaṇā pūtana gaṇāḥ graha gaṇāḥ nakṣatra gaṇāḥ aṣṭāviṃsati mahā yakṣa senāpati

original: catvāro mahārājānaḥ kṛmayo vītarāgaḥ himavaṃtanivāsino daśa dik* ye bhūtāḥ prativasaṃti rākṣasīgaṇāḥ pākiḍi /
analyzed: catvāraḥ mahā rājānaḥ kṛmayaḥ vīta rāgaḥ himavaṃta nivāsinaḥ daśa diś ye bhūtāḥ prativasaṃti rākṣasī gaṇāḥ

original: mahāratiḥ mātṛgaṇāś ca ye samudrakalpasya rakṣakaḥ purasmiṃ diśābhāge hari nāma rākṣasī :
analyzed: mahāratiḥ mātṛ gaṇāḥ ca ye samudra kalpasya rakṣakaḥ purasmin diśā bhāge hari nāma rākṣasī

original: dakṣaṇasmiṃ diśābhāge goṇāsi nāma rākṣasī paścimasmiṃ diśābhāge kesari nāma rākṣasī /
analyzed: dakṣaṇasmin diśābhāge goṇāsi nāma rākṣasī paścimasmin diśābhāge kesari nāma rākṣasī

original: uttarasmiṃ diśābhāge mahācūḍā nāma rākṣasī ity etā rākṣasī ghori ekaikaḥ ṣaṣṭikoṭiparivṛtaḥ
analyzed: uttarasmin diśā bhāge mahācūḍā nāma rākṣasī iti etāḥ rākṣasī ghori ekaikaḥ ṣaṣṭi koṭi parivṛtaḥ

original: te rāhulasya kumārasya nityaṃ rakṣaṃ mekhalāvidyāyāḥ rakṣa rakṣa mama gornikṣiṇasya rakṣaṃ kurvatu /
analyzed: te rāhulasya kumārasya nityam rakṣam mekhalā vidyāyāḥ rakṣa rakṣa mama goḥ nikṣiṇasya rakṣam kurvatu

hulu hulu hulu hulu hulu hulu hulu /
